title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
Ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into
steps: In a large bowl, marinate the chicken cubes in a mixture of yorghurt, lemon juice juice, cumin, corriander, tumeric, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper for atleast 30 minutes or upto overnight
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken and cook untill browned on all sides
Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside
In the same skillet, add onion and garlic and cook untill soft
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, heavy cream and cilantro. Bring to a simmer and cook for 5 minutes, untill the sauce thickens
Return the cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for few minutes to let the flavours meld
Serve over naan braed or rice
